keywords.name: ANTI-KEYWORD X+
keywords.description: Each time an attack is made with this weapon against a target with the keyword, a successful wound roll is equal to or greater than X+.

keywords.name: ASSAULT
keywords.description: Can be shot after advancing.

keywords.name: BATTLE-SHOCK
keywords.description: Failing means the unit can’t use Objective Control, use Stratagems, or Fall Back.

keywords.name: DEADLY DEMISE X
keywords.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6 for each model within X". On a 6, that model suffers a mortal wound.

keywords.name: DEEP STRIKE
keywords.description: Can arrive as Reinforcements 9" away from all enemy models.

keywords.name: DEVASTATING WOUNDS
keywords.description: Critical Wounds deal mortal wounds instead of regular damage.

keywords.name: DESPERATE ESCAPE
keywords.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a Desperate Escape test, it is destroyed on a roll of 1-2.

keywords.name: EMPOWERED BY CHAOS
keywords.description: When this unit is selected to fight, it can make a number of additional attacks equal to its Empowered value.

keywords.name: FEEL NO PAIN X+
keywords.description: Each time a model would lose a wound, roll one D6. If the result is equal to or greater than X, that wound is not lost.

keywords.name: FIGHTS FIRST
keywords.description: This unit’s attacks are resolved first in the Fight phase if it has not already fought.

keywords.name: HAZARDOUS
keywords.description: Each time a unit is selected to shoot or fight, roll one D6 for each model attacking with a hazardous weapon. On a 1, that model is destroyed.

keywords.name: HEAVY
keywords.description: If a unit Remains Stationary, add 1 to Hit rolls with this weapon until end of phase.

keywords.name: IGNORES COVER
keywords.description: Attacks made with this weapon ignore the benefits of cover.

keywords.name: INDIRECT FIRE
keywords.description: Can target units not visible to the bearer. Subtract 1 from Hit rolls and enemy receives Benefit of Cover.

keywords.name: INVULNERABLE SAVE X+
keywords.description: Each time a saving throw is made, use invulnerable save instead of normal save if it's better.

keywords.name: LANCE
keywords.description: If this unit made a Charge move this turn, improve this weapon's Strength and AP by 1.

keywords.name: LEADER
keywords.description: Can attach to a Bodyguard unit during deployment.

keywords.name: LETHAL HITS
keywords.description: Critical Hits automatically wound the target.

keywords.name: LONE OPERATIVE
keywords.description: Cannot be targeted by ranged attacks unless closest eligible target or within 12".

keywords.name: MELTA X
keywords.description: If target is within half range, add X to the weapon’s Damage characteristic.

keywords.name: OC (OBJECTIVE CONTROL)
keywords.description: The value of a model when controlling an objective marker.

keywords.name: ONE SHOT
keywords.description: This weapon can only be fired once per battle.

keywords.name: PISTOL
keywords.description: Can be shot while in Engagement Range of enemy units.

keywords.name: PRECISION
keywords.description: Can target CHARACTER models even if not closest target.

keywords.name: RAPID FIRE X
keywords.description: Double the number of attacks made with this weapon if the bearer is within half range.

keywords.name: RAPID INGRESS
keywords.description: Can be set up as Reinforcement in opponent’s Movement phase.

keywords.name: RE-ROLL X
keywords.description: Can re-roll a specified type of roll (Hit, Wound, Damage, etc).

keywords.name: REVEALING INFILTRATORS
keywords.description: This unit can be set up anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" away from enemy deployment zone and enemy models.

keywords.name: SCOUT X
keywords.description: After deployment but before first turn begins, can make a Normal move of up to X".

keywords.name: SUSTAINED HITS X
keywords.description: Each Critical Hit scores X additional hits.

keywords.name: STEALTH
keywords.description: Subtract 1 from the Hit roll for attacks made against this unit.

keywords.name: TORRENT
keywords.description: This weapon’s attacks automatically hit the target.

keywords.name: TRANSPORT
keywords.description: Can carry specified models inside. Units can disembark before moving.

keywords.name: TWIN-LINKED
keywords.description: You can re-roll the attack’s Wound roll.

keywords.name: WEAPON SKILL / BALLISTIC SKILL
keywords.description: Used to determine if an attack hits in melee/ranged combat.

keywords.name: WOUND
keywords.description: Used to determine if a hit successfully wounds a target.
